column4: arrrgh i hate RAM, i've just spent a shed load of cash on it and now i don't know what to do
nothing works with 4x1gb ram dimms in
with 3 in the system boots but crashes a little into doing anything
and then some on the internet say it's not good to have 3 sticks in and faster to just have 2 sticks with less mem
i'm mad and don't know where to turn
sound like you have some bad ram
yeah i just dunno - is it not efficient to use three sticks as it goes into single channel mode?
what are you doing that's so memory intensive?
in that case you need all the memory you can get
even though some people seem to think that three sticks of more memory is worse than two sticks of less, somthing to do with flicking into single channel mode??
the difference is not likely to be noticable, if you're worried benchmark your app
if you really care about speed, you shouldn't use a virtual machine
so basically it' s not gonna be that noticeable really and is better to just have more ram?
ok i've tried booting with 3 sticks in but my system is ok for a bit then will just lock up, been swapping mem modules around to try isolate a bad one but can't seem to....
try one at a time and memtest86
should be a boot option, if not it's on the livecd
